title: Let Go
lyrics:
13 Contributors
Let Go Lyrics
[Intro]
(To let go)
(Sometimes it's better to let go)
[Verse 1]
Sometimes it's better to say what you need
It's getting late, but you never sleep
I know it's hard, hard to admit
We grew apart, is what it is
[Pre-Chorus]
Lying in this bed
Ignoring everything we haven't said
[Chorus]
Sometimes it's better to let go
It's time to put down that halo
Baby, don't run from the twist of the knife
Love, it can hurt, but we tried
Wouldn't you say so?
[Post-Chorus]
Sometimes it's better to let go
Sometimes it's better to lеt go
Sometimes it's bettеr to let go



[Build]
[Drop]
Sometimes it's better to let go
[Verse 2]
Sometimes it's better to feel what you feel
And know what you break, it's gonna heal
[Pre-Chorus]
Lying in this bed
Ignoring everything we haven't said
[Chorus]
Sometimes it's better to let go
It's time to put down that halo
Baby, don't run from the twist of the knife
Love, it can hurt, but we tried
Wouldn't you say so?
[Build]
Sometimes it's better to let go
Sometimes it's better to let go, let go, let go
[Drop]
Sometimes it's better to let go



[Chorus]
Sometimes it's better to let go
It's time to put down that halo
Baby, don't run from the twist of the knife
Love, it can hurt, but we tried
Wouldn't you say so?
Sometimes it's better to let go
